input-variables.name: ticks
input-variables._comment: Will generate a variable ticks with 201 values from 0 to 200

input-variables.name: ratio-population-randomly-tested-daily
input-variables._comment: Will generate a variable ratio-testing with 11 values from 0 to 0.1

executor._comment: as ticks is an input variable, the executer will apply multiple ticks in a row

output._comment: all experiments having the same value for ratio-testing should be in the same file. Filenames will all contain ratio-testing=X in their name. This should generate 11 files, all containing 201 lines indicating the current tick and the #infected
